name: coffee-shop-message
description: Connected to a Flic button via the AWS API Gateway, sends Slack and SNS messages when our local coffee shop is closing for the day.
author: Tim Malone <tdmalone@gmail.com>

scripts.bootstrap: rm -rf node_modules && yarn --prod && rm function.zip && zip -r function.zip index.js package.json node_modules && yarn
scripts.docker-tests: yarn docker-test-1 && yarn docker-test-2 && yarn docker-test-3
scripts._docker: docker run --rm -e CI -e SLACK_HOOK_DEV -e SNS_TOPIC_DEV -e AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID -e AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY -e AWS_DEFAULT_REGION -v "${PWD}":/var/task lambci/lambda:nodejs6.10 index.handler
